EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_7AM_Introducing CF Java Client 2.0_Q316.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/introducing-the-cloud-foundry-java-client-gmt]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming webinar Introducing the Cloud Foundry Java Client 2.0 on Tuesday, September 27, 2016.
Please see event details below: Date: Tuesday, September 27, 2016 {{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}} Time: 7:00am PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00)
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1261537/CFEAF03C47DF695A99F42245B3232B76]]>
Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming via your computer speakers.
We look forward to you joining us.
The Pivotal Team
